preconditions.precondition: The Chef selects the ingredient to update

mainSequence.step: UI layer requests current expiry date
Backend server queries ingredient expiry date from the database
Backend server shows the current expiry date to the UI layer
UI layer submits the updated expiry date to the backend server
Backend server updates the expiry date in the database
Backend server confirms the successful update to the UI layer
UI layer displays the update confirmation to the Chef
